name: Wind-Up Maintenance Zenmaicon
desc:
Link Arrows: [ü°∑][ü°∂]

2 "Wind-Up" monsters
If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Wind-Up" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Wind-Up Maintenance Zenmaicon" once per turn.
‚óè If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Wind-Up" card from your Deck to your hand.
‚óè You can banish 1 face-up "Wind-Up" monster you control, face-down; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name from your Deck.
